image.description: A serene Japanese zen garden with raked sand patterns resembling traffic lanes
A crowded highway at sunset with cars arranged to form a yin-yang symbol
A group of people doing yoga poses on top of their cars in a gridlocked intersection
A giant slice of pizza floating in space with pepperoni arranged like cars in a traffic jam
A bonsai tree growing out of a toy car stuck in a miniature traffic jam
A Buddha statue wearing noise-cancelling headphones in the middle of a chaotic intersection
A group of penguins waddling in an orderly line across a busy crosswalk
A massive hourglass filled with tiny cars instead of sand, with the text 'Time is an illusion' overlaid
A random image of a pineapple wearing sunglasses on a beach with the text 'In conclusion' overlaid
